task_name: book a nurse for my father
task_description: Task to book a nurse for my father

must_have: I'm not really sure what's important
nice_to_have: Nurse who can manage wound care and dressing changes
Nurse who has experience with chronic illnesses
Nurse with experience in palliative care
deal_breakers: Nurse does not have experience with elderly patients
Nurse does not have a flexible schedule for emergencies

technical: Some kind of device for monitoring health, maybe a 'health tracker' or something
I think I need a nurse who can use high-tech stuff, but I'm not clear on what's best
non_technical: A good vibe or something that feels right, I guess
I heard communication skills are important, but I'm not sure how to measure that

must_meet: Nurse should be available for short notice, but also have a set schedule, which is confusing
They must be able to do basic stuff but also advanced care, whatever that means
should_meet: I think having good reviews online is important, but I don't know what that looks like
They might need to be flexible yet also have strict hours, not sure how that works
nice_to_meet: If they have some kind of certification, that's good, but I don't know which ones
It would be nice if they were familiar with technology but also down-to-earth

metadata.task: book a nurse for my father
